name: AVIA AVIATION PTY LTD
about: Avia Aviation, founded in 2011, is a premier flight school based at Moorabbin Airport in Melbourne, Australia. As the longest-standing Cirrus training organisation in Australia, Avia boasts a team of highly experienced instructors, including a Platinum Cirrus Standardised Instructor Pilot (CSIP). Our staff, with over 14,000 hours of combined flying experience, are dedicated to providing world-class general aviation services. We offer training for Recreational, Private, and Commercial Pilot Licences, as well as Multi-Engine and IFR training. Our commitment to safety and client satisfaction is unwavering, ensuring a smooth and efficient aviation experience. With a focus on tailored instruction and continuous learning, Avia Aviation is your trusted partner in achieving your aviation goals. We are passionate about flying and dedicated to helping you succeed.
